department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Automatic Pipetting Station for the Department of Health.
description: Provide an automatic pipetting station for Health Canada and the Blood Products Division of the Biologic and Radiopharmaceutical Drugs Directorate.
full_summary:
### RFP: Automatic Pipetting Station
#### Solicitation Number: WS4363570528
#### Publication Date: December 22, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: January 15, 2024 at 14:00 EST

### Summary of Solicitation:
Health Canada has a requirement for the supply of one automatic pipetting station, including installation and training. This solicitation invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the provision of this equipment, which must meet all mandatory technical requirements specified in the bid solicitation.

### Key Dates:
- Tender Closing Date: January 15, 2024 at 14:00 EST
- Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
- Expected Contract End Date: March 28, 2024
- Amendment Date: January 10, 2024

### Solicitation Details:
- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- End User: Department of Health (HC)
- Supply of Goods/Services: Automatic pipetting station, including installation and training
- Mandatory Technical Requirements: See bid solicitation
- Evaluation Criteria: Mandatory technical requirements and lowest evaluated price

### Contact Information:
- Contact Person: Barnett, Delaney (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: delaney.barnett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18347541?extsite=MTgzNDc1NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that the bid must respect the requirements of the bid solicitation. All deliverables, including installation and training, must be accepted on or before March 28, 2024. Bids submitted after 14:00 EST on January 15, 2024, will be declared non-responsive. The supplier with the lowest evaluated price that meets all mandatory technical requirements will be recommended for contract award.
